thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Life without sound

author: news24.com
title: Life without sound
text:
LIFE WITHOUT SOUND (DEDICATED TO ME BY MY MOM)
The rhythm of life speaks out,
Birds chirp I cannot hear,
Yet I embrace their spirit...
My soul feel life's vibration,
I am a nation without sound,
My heart feels the rhythm,
Leaves fall even a whisper I hear...
I do not have to hear
What you say,
My eyes are the windows
To the rhythm of life...
Music you might wonder,
How I hear.
The lyrics are in my heart
And the rhythm comes
From within...
Facial expression,
Body language,
I hear your smile,
Even a hush...
The rhythm of life I hear...
Your insinuating stare,
Or should I care
I have power of sound
I look at life I hear...
Copyright : Ravics Ramsami (2012)
